title: Vallei Van Sluiers
resume: VALLEY OF SLUIERS is the story of some well-known Boland fruit farmers families, the De Bruyns, the Roberts'e and the Van Rhijns ... and of the people who are pulled by the three families in the wickedness, twist and scandal. Why is there so much tension and unhealthy rivalry between the families? Eventually, the secrets of the three ground barons, Con De Bruyn, Oom Boykie Roberts and Markus Van Rhijn, are cut off and exposed to law.
